mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts ( url, title, description, keyword, content, top_image_title, top_image_url, top_image_alt, category_id, status_id, updater_id, created, updated, delflg ) VALUES ( #{url}, #{title}, #{description}, #{keyword}, #{content}, #{topImageTitle}, #{topImageUrl}, #{topImageAlt}, #{categoryId}, #{statusId}, #{updaterId}, #{created}, #{updated}, #{delflg} )
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET url = #{url}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, keyword = #{keyword}, content = #{content}, top_image_title = #{topImageTitle}, top_image_url = #{topImageUrl}, top_image_alt = #{topImageAlt}, category_id = #{categoryId}, status_id = #{statusId}, updater_id = #{updaterId}, created = #{created}, updated = #{updated}, delflg = #{delflg} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, url, title, description, keyword, content, top_image_title AS "topImageTitle", top_image_url AS "topImageUrl", top_image_alt AS "topImageAlt", category_id AS "categoryId", status_id AS "statusId", updater_id AS "updaterId", created, updated, delflg FROM posts WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT posts.id, posts.url, posts.title, posts.description, posts.keyword, posts.content, posts.top_image_title AS "topImageTitle", posts.top_image_url AS "topImageUrl", posts.top_image_alt AS "topImageAlt", posts.category_id AS "categoryId", posts.status_id AS "statusId", posts.updater_id AS "updaterId", posts.created, posts.updated, posts.delflg, users.name AS "updaterName" FROM posts INNER JOIN users AS users ON posts.updater_id = users.id ORDER BY updated DESC

SELECT posts.id, posts.url, posts.title, posts.description, posts.keyword, posts.content, posts.top_image_title AS "topImageTitle", posts.top_image_url AS "topImageUrl", posts.top_image_alt AS "topImageAlt", posts.category_id AS "categoryId", posts.status_id AS "statusId", posts.updater_id AS "updaterId", posts.created, posts.updated, posts.delflg, users.name AS "updaterName", categories.name AS "categoryName" FROM posts INNER JOIN users ON posts.updater_id = users.id INNER JOIN categories ON posts.category_id = categories.id WHERE posts.delflg = #{delflg} ORDER BY updated DESC
